text: 19:11 Onger Akaba 59:1Ezɨ Sol uan ingangarir gumaziba amadagha ghaze, ia Devitɨn dɨpenimɨn mangɨ a korogh, egh bar mɨzaraghara ia mɨsueghtɨ an aremegh. Ezɨ Devitɨn amuim Mikal, kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ datɨrɨghɨn dɨmagarir kamra nɨ arɨmangɨgh. Puvatɨghtɨ, me gurumɨn mɨzaraghara izɨ nɨ mɨsueghtɨ, nɨ aremegham.”
